Test Name: Thiopurine methyltransferase (TPMT) and NUDIX hydrolase (NUDT15) genotyping
Purpose: To identify TPMT and NUDT15 genetic polymorphisms that affect thiopurine metabolism and predict risk of drug toxicity or therapy failure.
Container: EDTA tube (lavender top) for whole blood or buccal swab in DNA stabilization solution
Equipment: PCR thermal cycler, centrifuge, automated DNA extractor, gel electrophoresis equipment, real-time PCR machine, DNA extraction kit
